titleStmt.title: A true testimony from the people of God (who by the world are called Quakers) of the doctrines of the prophets, Christ, and the Apostles, which is witnessed unto, by them who are now raised up by the same power, and quickned by the same spirit and blood of the everlasting convenant which brought again our Lord Jesus from the dead ... / by M.F.
titleStmt.author: Fox, Margaret Askew Fell, 1614-1702.
